comments:
When I run a small program, it runs fine from Command Launcher, but if from Run
Launch Configuration, I choose C++ Application and type in executable. it comes
out a Launch Configuration Error: Exception
occured while launching configuration.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<LOG>

      messate="Error logged from DEbug UI: "

	message="Exception occurred while launching."
	trace="
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException[5013]: java.lang.NullPointerException

">
      </exception>
   </status>
<.log-entry>

I verified that it worked.
We can resolve this bug.

Looks like it was a case of mismatched Eclipse versus CDT version.  
Needed Eclipse F1.
